dc.title: Federal Voting Assistance Program - Home - To Vote Absentee, Start By Telling Us Who You Are
dc.description: FVAP.Gov is a one-stop-shop for Uniformed and Oveseas Citizens Absentee Voting Act (UOCAVA) citizens for absentee voting related information. UOCAVA citizens are active duty military, uniformed services of NOAA and PHS, merchant marine, their family members and overseas citizens. FVAP.gov provides State by State instructions for voter registration, ballot request and for completion of the Federal Write In Absentee Ballot when the State ballot is not received.
